0.0.0.title: DBOS Public Domain Declaration
items: I’m not submitting in someone else’s name. If I’ve named an affiliated organization, I was affiliated with that organization when I made the finding I‛ve described.
I performed the investigation that resulted in the finding.

As far as I know, I was the first to make the finding, or among the group that did. If I was part of a group, I have written permission from all my coworkers to contribute our finding to the public domain.

I commit to exercise the legal rights and discretion that I have, as an individual, to ensure the contribution of the finding to the public domain. I commit to publish a warning if I ever become aware of any patent, patent application, or other exclusive right that might limit who can legally use the finding, or how, as long as I can legally do so.
